name: Tri-Headed Behemoth
text: If a face-up card(s) you control is destroyed by card effect, even during the Damage Step: You can Special Summon this card from your hand. You can only use this effect of "Tri-Headed Behemoth" once per turn. If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can activate this effect; during the End Phase of this turn, Special Summon 1 WIND monster from your GY, but its ATK/DEF become 1000. You can only use this effect of "Tri-Headed Behemoth" once per Duel.
